rule: The output must consist of only one of two categories: "funny" or "not funny".
input: What did the duck say to the bartender? Put it on my bill.
validityText:
The input provided is a joke. It is in text format and presents a pun, relying on the double meaning of the word "bill" to create humor. The input specification allows for any type of content, including puns, anecdotes, or any form of humor, and does not restrict the length of the joke. Therefore, the input complies with all the input specification rules.

OK
